_README_NOTE: All item names (used in inventory, take, examine) and target names (used in 'use' command) are defined in Title Case for consistency. Commands are case-insensitive.

items.name: Sledgehammer
items.description: A heavy, industrial hammer. Looks perfect for demolishing weak masonry.

usability.effectDescription: You swing the Sledgehammer with all your might against the weak spot. With a spray of dust and stone, the wall collapses, revealing a new passage!

items.name: Rubble
items.description: A pile of broken stone and dust. You can move past it, but it's not going anywhere.

items.name: Key Card
items.description: A plastic security card, slightly scratched. It might grant access to restricted areas.

items.name: Crank
items.description: A metal crank handle. It looks like it could fit into a mechanism.

usability.effectDescription: You insert the heavy metal Crank into the socket and turn it. A loud *CLANG* echoes, and a locking signal disengages. You remove the Crank.

items.name: Weak Wall
items.description: A section of the northern wall looks strangely thin and cracked. It might give way under heavy force.

items.name: Maintenance Log
items.description: A dusty logbook detailing routine repairs. The last entry reads: 'Door to the Control Room requires card AND crank engagement.'

items.name: Crank Socket
items.description: A mechanism with a square socket, obviously designed for a heavy crank handle.

rooms.name: Rusty Boiler Room
rooms.description: The air is thick with the smell of old oil and rust. Massive, cold boilers line the walls. A small maintenance tunnel leads North.

rooms.name: Maintenance Tunnel
rooms.description: A dark, cramped tunnel. It opens up into a larger, brighter area to the north. The floor is slick with water. To the south, you see the Weak Wall.

rooms.name: Guard Post
rooms.description: This small, abandoned guard post has a desk, a deactivated security monitor, and a maintenance log lying open on the floor. A heavy door is to the East.

rooms.name: East Corridor
rooms.description: A long, brightly lit corridor. To the north is a large, locked mechanical door labeled 'Control Room'. To the west, you see the Guard Post.

conditions.failMessage: The door panel flashes red. You need the Key Card AND the signal from the crank mechanism to open this.
The way South is blocked by debris from a collapsed wall. You need to clear the rubble.

rooms.name: Control Room
rooms.description: You've made it! This room is filled with consoles and blinking lights. A clear victory. You can go back south.

rooms.name: South Passage
rooms.description: A damp, twisting passage that leads to the Old Workshop.

rooms.name: Old Workshop
rooms.description: This room is clearly an old workshop, filled with broken tools and forgotten machinery. A Crank Socket is set into the main wall.
